name: Deli-very-Fast
description:
Deliver orders before competitors steal your customers! Oh, and you don't have brakes on your car.

Arrow keys to move. Go to the shops (marked with burger icons) and they'll show you where their customers are (you can only have three on your map at any given time).

Go to the customers (green blocks) before they are stolen by competitors (time left shown by red tint) to make money. You'll lose money if you miss a customer.

Use the money to increase fuel. but be careful! If you pay too much attention to increasing fuel, you might miss a customer!

If you have less than 0 Money or no fuel, you lose.
